userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: King George II's Letter to Duke Ludwig Rudolph of Brunswick and Lunenburg, 1732 Jan 28, Manuscript # 1930.7, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Confirms the Duke's receipt of the territory of Eichsfeld, Duverstadt, etc. from Princess Maria Elizabeth, Duchess of Schleswig-Holstein, etc. German with abstract in French.
